text:
Extract doves and rice. We have a celebrity wedding going on!

Justin Bieber has officially unveiled the question about the model Hailey Baldwin . The pop singer and his future bride are officially engaged and the ring is bigger than life.

But aside from the wonderful ring, we're all eager to see the parties, engagement photos and, of course, the star studded ceremony. The real question that we all die of wanting to know, however, is what will you walk with the cat star in the hallway?

It is no secret that the future promise marries all the most fashionable trends in couture. In fact, he always gave us an extreme beggar's air. Between her striking striped dress at the 201

7 Cannes Film Festival and her unforgettable Tommy Hilfiger dress at this year's Met Gala, Hailey has been ready for this moment throughout her life and we're here for it.
title: 12 Times Hailey Baldwin Gave Us Total Bride Vibes
